<Meta title="Templates/Actions/Create Case With Attachments" />

# Create Case With Attachments Action
 
```jsx
const CreateCaseWithAttachmentsAction = (props) => withActionView({
	...props,
	title: <ResourceCreateViewTitle resourceName="Case"/>,
	ViewForm: ResourceCreateWizard,
	pages: [CreateCasePropertiesPage, CreateCasePreviewPage, CreateCaseAttachmentsPage],
	submitLabel: 'Create'
}, () => null);
```
